notesStmt.note: Leaves missing after folio 138, 140, 144, 154, 158, 160, 162, 166, 175. Ink slightly fading.
Yitsḥaḳ ben Menaḥem ha-Gadol: inscribed, folio 167r, upper margin.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: A volume containing the glosses which are written on the margins of Add. 17049 and 17050 (Alfasi's commentary on Seder Mo῾ed, Nashim and Neziḳin).

collation.p: Quires of mostly 8 leaves each, signed with catchwords at the end.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Ashkenazi square and semi-cursive script of the 14th century.

binding.p: BM in-house. Spine title: 'Alfasi Halakhoth in Seder Nezikin and Nashim. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Additional 17,052.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Thomas Rodd the younger (b. 1796, d. 1849): purchased from him by the British Museum on 23 October 1847: inscribed, folio [103v]: Macdonald's sale, lot 160.
